Elastic waves space-time diagrams¶

ELWA-SPATID is a Python module for the computation of space-time diagrams for the propagation of elastic waves in 1D rods. The rods can have impedance variations along the propagation axis, and it is possible to consider several rods in contact.

Initial conditions can be:

  • a prescribed input force at the left end of the first rod;

  • a prescribed velocity of the left rod, which impacts the next rod.

Boundary conditions can be:

  • two rods in contact;

  • free end (total reflexion of waves);

  • plain end (no reflexion, equivalent to anechoic condition).
